name: emoji-pacman-bot
description: Bot for emoji pacman twitter account

scripts.aws-deploy: run() { cd "$1" && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file deploy/sam.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name $npm_package_name-"$1" --parameter-overrides version=$npm_package_version stage="$AWS_PROFILE"; }; run
scripts.aws-package: run() { cd "$1" && aws cloudformation package --template-file sam.json --output-template-file deploy/sam.yaml --s3-bucket emoji-bot-deployment-"$AWS_PROFILE"; }; run
scripts.build: run() { cd "$1" && npm test -- "$1" && npm run build-src -- "$1" && npm run build-scripts -- "$1"; }; run
scripts.build-scripts: run() { cd "$1" && [ -f rollup.scripts.js ] && rollup -c rollup.scripts.js || echo "***** No scripts to build *****"; }; run
scripts.build-src: run() { cd "$1" && [ -f rollup.config.js ] && rollup -c rollup.config.js || echo "***** No src to build *****"; }; run
scripts.build-tests: run() { cd "$1" && [ -f rollup.tests.js ] && rollup -c rollup.tests.js || echo "***** No tests to build *****"; }; run
scripts.clean: run() { cd "$1" && rm -rf deploy/ && rm -rf .tests/ && rm -rf .scripts/; }; run
scripts.push: run() { npm run aws-package -- "$1" && npm run aws-deploy -- "$1"; }; run
scripts.test: run() { cd "$1" && npm run build-tests -- "$1" && mocha --recursive .tests; }; run

author: Brock Gibson
